problem_text: If \triangle J K L \sim \triangle P Q R and the area of \triangle J K L is 30 square inches, find the area of \triangle P Q R.
compact_text: If \triangle JKL \sim \triangle PQR and the area of \triangle JKL is 30 square inches, find the area of \triangle PQR.
annotat_text:
If $\triangle J K L \sim \triangle P Q R$ and the area of $\triangle J K L$ is
30 square inches, find the area of $\triangle P Q R$。
